entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] Build failure in linux.riscv64.Checked - No usable version of clang found #100564
  • Test suite crash in new exception handling #100563
  • WasmApp.Native.targets warning WASM0001: Could not get pinvoke, or callbacks for method 'System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests+WindowsUILanguageHelper::EnumUILanguages' because 'Parsing function pointer types in signatures is not supported.' - ProxyProjectForAOTOnHelix.proj #100562
  • Uninitialized memory usage in MethodTableBuilder #100559
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Net5Compat.Tests and System.IO.Tests suddenly exiting with error 137 #100558
  • Package support for Azure Linux 3.0 #100557
  • Incremental builds failing because of missing FireEtwGCDynamicEvent #100556
  • DataContractJsonSerializer not passing ISerializationSurrogateProvider to internal xml serializer #100553
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` to represent Swift structs and enums in C# #100543
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer doesn't support valid TimeSpan formats #100538
    Future
  • Is it possible to implement a self-referential static abstract interface method in Reflection.Emit? #100537
  • Vectorized implementation of TensorPrimitives.Pow is broken for negative values #100535
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] QuicException: Stream aborted by peer (258) in `(POST Duplex | PUT) Slow` #100534
    9.0.0
  • Request for analyser ICU usage and/or TZ data #100531
  • QuicListener Not Including Intermediary Certificates Without Explicit ServerCertificateContext #100530
  • [HttpStress] Consider adding a nightly HTTP/3.0 leg with standard Release MSQUIC build #100529
    Future
  • [WASM] When AOT is used it throws Arg_InvalidCastException #100527
    9.0.0
  • RuntimeException with Incorrect Advice #100524
  • Running multiple .net core containers on a single node #100521
  • System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer: A non-collectible assembly may not reference a collectible assembly #100519
  • XmlSerializer does not work with collections in collectible ALC #100518
  • HttpClient without initial proxy auth limits web scraping capability #100515
  • Enable allocation of singletons on frozen heap in shared generic code #100510
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm] Determinism test failure #100508
  • [NativeAOT/win-x86] System.Runtime.Tests crash #100507
  • Can we avoid resetting all env vars for some remotely executed tests? #100505
  • [API Proposal]: Task.WhenAll to return results in a strongly typed tuple #100504

Closed

  • Heap corruption when Target OS is set #100544
  • [API Proposal]: `InvalidEnumArgumentException` should support `uint/long/ulong`-backed enumerations #95696
    9.0.0
  • STJ: JsonNode.ReplaceWith used with an array will result in a node that identifies as array but is not a JsonArray node #100470
  • [API Proposal]: JsonNode.ReplaceWith #100468
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer.Deserialize(ReadOnlySequence) #100478
  • Text.Json fails to serialize schema with properties of derived overloaded classes #100523
  • Debug.Assert exception I encountered when using Debug version System.Private.CoreLib.dll with mono runtime #96324
  • TLS 1.3 negotiation fails with FIPS-enabled Ubuntu 22.04 server and Chromium based browsers #99289
    8.0.x
  • Awaiting nongeneric Task.WhenAll changes behavior in .NET 8 to throw the last exception instead of the first #93504
  • Browser SignalRClientTests failing in CI #100307
    9.0.0
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient() is popping up a challenge for the system keychain on MacOS #99335
  • System.Threading.Timer uses wrong TimeSpan property for "period" on linux-bionic-arm native aot #100332
  • Test failure: Interop/NativeLibrary/Callback/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix.cmd #99885
  • Empty array allocated on the Frozen Heap for a Collectible type? #100437
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Making "Process asynchronous tasks as they complete" easy by using IAsyncEnumerable #61959
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.Box #100561
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix use of uninitialized `bool` value #100560
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: fix early convergence in profile count solver #100552
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #100551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Channel.CreateUnboundedPrioritized #100550
    area-System.Threading.Channels, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Fix sve unit tests #100549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Cleanup of `fx_resolver_t` and tests in `NativeHostApis` #100542
    area-Host
  • JIT: Disable more_tailcalls under GCStress #100540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add ABI classifier for arm32 #100526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add log to SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException. #100525
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Enable System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests for HybridGlobalization on v8 #100522
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • [browser][mt] Fix `SignalRClientTests` timeouts #100516
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Avoid frequent calls to CertificateValidationPal.IsLocalCertificateUsed #100513
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix building x86 Windows native AOT runtime packs #100512
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Avoid allocating collectible instances in the frozen heap (#100444) #100509
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.5 #100547
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.19 #100546
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.30 #100545
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Disable System.Net.Quic tests on arm32 #100514
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow for setting of isOfficialBuild when uploading intermediate artifacts #100528
    area-Infrastructure
  • SPMI: Fix Python 3.12 warnings in superpmi.py #100533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix interop test log statement #100511
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • Fix more diagnostics with CA2263 #100490
    area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] fix error propagation when calling JSImport of missing JS function #100408
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add JitOptRepeat to JIT experimental AzDO pipeline #100326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] reduce sample re-link #100517
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][wbt] SignalRClientTests - wait for selectors of all the buttons #100450
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.5
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add separate ABI classifiers for x86/win-x64/SysV-x64/ARM64 #100276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make JitOptRepeat available in Release builds #100494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Guard against -1 Returned from sysconf for the Cache Sizes Causing Large Gen0 Sizes and Budgets for Certain Linux Distributions. #100502
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Update JIT sources to clang-format/clang-tidy 17.0.6 #100498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • DATAS tuning changes for small HCs #100390
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Fix origin for warnings due to event methods #100500
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] reduce managed transition on UI thread after start #100410
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] smaller thread pool #100415
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use macros to form the ARM64 instruction format search table #100403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • enable AutomaticOrManual_DoesntFailRegardlessOfWhetherClientCertsAreAvailable test #100496
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Force 2 iterations of OptRepeat #100473
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
